ingredients.ingredient: 1 pinch kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
½ cup freshly grated Pecorino cheese
2 ½ pounds baking potatoes, peeled and sliced
¼ cup chopped fresh parsley, divided
6 ounces baked ham, sliced and cubed

cookingTips: Slice potatoes uniformly and thin—about 1/8 inch—for even cooking throughout the dish
Layer potatoes and ham alternately with the Alfredo sauce for distributed flavor
Cover with foil while baking to retain moisture, then uncover near the end to develop a golden top
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you ensure the potatoes cook through while creating a creamy, cohesive dish?
